control_attributes.control_description: The organization provides the capability to expeditiously disconnect or disable remote access to the information system within [Assignment: organization-defined time period].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization prohibits the use of [Assignment: organization-defined network accessible storage devices] in external information systems.
